# Datos
```{r}
x10 <- c(-1, 0, 2)
y10 <- c(4, 1, 3)
```
# Sistema para P2(x) = a0 + a1*x + a2*x^2
```{r}
A10 <- matrix(c(1, -1, 1,
1, 0, 0,
1, 2, 4), ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
coef10 <- solve(A10, y10)

print("Coeficientes del polinomio (a0, a1, a2):")
print(coef10)
```
# Polinomio
```{r}
P10 <- function(x) coef10[1] + coef10[2]*x + coef10[3]*x^2
```
# Verificación de puntos
```{r}
print("Verificación de P2(x) en los nodos originales:")
for (xi in x10) {
print(paste("x =", xi, "→ P2(x) =", P10(xi)))
}
```
# Gráfica
```{r}
plot(x10, y10, pch = 19, col = "blue", main = "Ejercicio 10: Interpolación cuadrática",
xlab = "x", ylab = "P2(x)")
curve(P10(x), add = TRUE, col = "red", lwd = 2)
legend("topleft", legend = c("Datos", "Polinomio interpolante"),
col = c("blue", "red"), pch = c(19, NA), lty = c(NA, 1))
```
